{{Description|"Our dreams touch at midnight, their song ringing on in our hearts."}}
'''Aisa Utamakura Pilgrimage''' is [[Yumemizuki Mizuki]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{Talent Note|particles|1}}
** This particle generation can trigger up to 4 times per use of the Elemental Skill.
* During Dreamdrifter:
** Mizuki cannot use [[Normal Attack|Normal]] or [[Charged Attack|Charged]] Attacks.
** Mizuki can deal '''7''' instances of damage over 5 seconds, and up to '''13''' instances over 10 seconds with her Passive Talent 1 unlocked.
** Mizuki can deal damage during [[Anraku Secret Spring Therapy]] animation. She will temporarily stop drifting during the animation.
** Mizuki gains a small amount of [[Interruption Resistance]].

;<big>Passive Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|ascension|1|Bright Moon's Restless Voice}}
* {{Talent Note|ascension|2|Thoughts by Day Bring Dreams by Night}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|constellation|1|In Mist-Like Waters}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|2|Your Echo I Meet in Dreams}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|3|Till Dawn's Moon Ends Night}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|6|The Heart Lingers Long}}
